CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Managing document permissions in Outlook for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Now, when you add a OneDrive or SharePoint file to an email, Outlook will notify you if anyone doesn't yet have permissions so you can update those before sending your email.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Managing document permissions in Outlook for iOS
OldVersion.description: Now, when you add a OneDrive or SharePoint file to an email, Outlook will notify you if anyone doesn't yet have permissions so you can update those before sending your email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Adaptive Protection
CurrentVersion.description: ,Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Adaptive Protection
OldVersion.description: ,Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Activity explorer export limit increase (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: The activity explorer's export limit will increase from 10K to 100K records. This update will benefit organizations that prefer exporting user activity insights to a CSV file, as they now can filter, sort, or pivot a bigger data set more conveniently. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Activity explorer export limit increase (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: The activity explorer's export limit will increase from 10K to 100K records. This update will benefit organizations that prefer exporting user activity insights to a CSV file, as they now can filter, sort, or pivot a bigger data set more conveniently. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Options Categorization
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing grouping within Meeting Options to improve organizers’ and co-organizers’ ease of understanding selections.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting Options Categorization
OldVersion.description: We are introducing grouping within Meeting Options to improve organizers’ and co-organizers’ ease of understanding selections.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced content extraction and file type coverage for DLP on Windows devices
OldVersion.description:
,
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Exchange and SharePoint Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 4 new Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MailItemsAccessed; 2. Send; 3. SearchQueryInitiatedExchange; 4. SearchQueryInitiatedSharepoint; The following logs will differ based upon the user’s license. This following additional metadata is added to Exchange logs when the user is assigned an Audit Premium license: Premium Insight 1: SensitivityLabel for MailItemsAccessed

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Exchange and SharePoint Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
OldVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security activity events for Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint. As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 4 new Microsoft Exchange and SharePoint events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. MailItemsAccessed; 2. Send; 3. SearchQueryInitiatedExchange; 4. SearchQueryInitiatedSharepoint; The following logs will differ based upon the user’s license. This following additional metadata is added to Exchange logs when the user is assigned an Audit Premium license: Premium Insight 1: SensitivityLabel for MailItemsAccessed

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to delete indicator variants
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this update, admins with appropriate permissions will be able to delete any of the indicator variants created. Deletion of variants will directly delete it from all the Insider Risk Management policies being used. Any old insights related to the variants will remain for future reference. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to delete indicator variants
OldVersion.description: ,With this update, admins with appropriate permissions will be able to delete any of the indicator variants created. Deletion of variants will directly delete it from all the Insider Risk Management policies being used. Any old insights related to the variants will remain for future reference. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Saved views in Activity explorer
CurrentVersion.description: During an alert investigation, analysts usually use various filters and columns in activity explorer to understand the risk activities that may lead to potential data security incidents. With this update, an Insider Risk Management analyst can quickly use a previously configured combination of filters and columns with one click. This can help analysts efficiently work through recurring activities without manually setting up filters every time. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Saved views in Activity explorer
OldVersion.description: During an alert investigation, analysts usually use various filters and columns in activity explorer to understand the risk activities that may lead to potential data security incidents. With this update, an Insider Risk Management analyst can quickly use a previously configured combination of filters and columns with one click. This can help analysts efficiently work through recurring activities without manually setting up filters every time. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New search UI for contacts and global address list
CurrentVersion.description: A new in-flow experience for searching contacts and the global address list while addressing mail and calendar events.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New search UI for contacts and global address list
OldVersion.description: A new in-flow experience for searching contacts and the global address list while addressing mail and calendar events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to create custom tags in Communication Compliance policies
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance introduces the ability to create custom tags to give Investigators the flexibility of using tags that fit their team/ organization's requirements. Leverage custom tags to leave more meaningful information for each policy match and to help other investigators understand the status of a message. Default tags will continue to be available for use.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to create custom tags in Communication Compliance policies
OldVersion.description: Communication Compliance introduces the ability to create custom tags to give Investigators the flexibility of using tags that fit their team/ organization's requirements. Leverage custom tags to leave more meaningful information for each policy match and to help other investigators understand the status of a message. Default tags will continue to be available for use.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: New feature for silence removal (pauses) in Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: ,We think editing your video could be a quick job but isn't necessarily so sometimes. Silence removal uses AI auto transcription to transcribe your audio. We infer pauses in your speech transcription and any gaps in the speech we detected for more than 3 seconds is considered a pause. We provide you with the option to remove all pauses at once with a single click or to review each pause where you can adjust and consider ones you want to keep.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: New feature for silence removal (pauses) in Clipchamp
OldVersion.description: ,We think editing your video could be a quick job but isn't necessarily so sometimes. Silence removal uses AI auto transcription to transcribe your audio. We infer pauses in your speech transcription and any gaps in the speech we detected for more than 3 seconds is considered a pause. We provide you with the option to remove all pauses at once with a single click or to review each pause where you can adjust and consider ones you want to keep.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Collapsible Date Headers on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: You now can collapse and expand the date headers in the Message List when you've chosen "Show date headers in the message list" in your Settings. Collapse all emails from "This week" to quickly get to the rest of the emails from "This month."

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Collapsible Date Headers on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: You now can collapse and expand the date headers in the Message List when you've chosen "Show date headers in the message list" in your Settings. Collapse all emails from "This week" to quickly get to the rest of the emails from "This month."

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Gain contextual summary of Communication Compliance matches with Copilot for Security
CurrentVersion.description:
,Copilot for Security is embedded in Communication Compliance to summarize policy matches in the context of business conduct and regulatory compliance classifiers that flagged the content.
Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance Security Copilot - Contextual Summarization
OldVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the Security Copilot feature to generate contextual summaries of long messages in the context of the conditions that flagged the messages as potentially risky. Investigators can pinpoint the potentially risky content in the message and understand the premise of the entire message with just one click of a button. In addition to contextual summaries, users can ask additional questions in an open text prompt for deeper insight on the message content.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Easily manage Do Not Disturb presence status when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing a setting that allows Teams Phone Mobile users to opt-out of your presence automatically transitioning to Do Not Disturb when presenting or screen sharing. When this setting is enabled, users will be able to continue to receive call notifications when presenting, without having to manually adjust their presence status.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Easily manage Do Not Disturb presence status when screen sharing
OldVersion.description: We're introducing a setting that allows Teams Phone Mobile users to opt-out of your presence automatically transitioning to Do Not Disturb when presenting or screen sharing. When this setting is enabled, users will be able to continue to receive call notifications when presenting, without having to manually adjust their presence status.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Exfiltration of business-sensitive data to free public domain emails
CurrentVersion.description:
,In this update, we are enhancing the existing email insight alerts to provide additional information when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. The new domain detection group "Free public domains" will list the common domains used for personal email accounts. Admins with appropriate permissions can choose to select these domains in their indicator variants.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Exfiltration of business-sensitive data to free public domain emails
OldVersion.description:
,In this update, we are enhancing the existing email insight alerts to provide additional information when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. The new domain detection group "Free public domains" will list the common domains used for personal email accounts. Admins with appropriate permissions can choose to select these domains in their indicator variants.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections now available on web
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Connections is now available directly on the browser. All the same functionalities that exist in Teams now also surface directly in the browser, providing a consistent experience with other Viva Modules.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections now available on web
OldVersion.description: Viva Connections is now available directly on the browser. All the same functionalities that exist in Teams now also surface directly in the browser, providing a consistent experience with other Viva Modules.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Microsoft Copilot available in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto-labeling policies support Fingerprinting SITs
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can now automatically label files and emails with Fingerprinting SITs via auto-labeling policies.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto-labeling policies support Fingerprinting SITs
OldVersion.description: ,Admins can now automatically label files and emails with Fingerprinting SITs via auto-labeling policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Clipchamp for Education (A3 & A5)
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp enables rapid editing and creation of videos on OneDrive and SharePoint including features like trim, join, transitions, filters, text overlay, audio controls, screen/camera recording and more. Available via the web or Windows app for Microsoft 365 A3 and Microsoft 365 A5 SKUs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Clipchamp for Education (A3 & A5)
OldVersion.description: Clipchamp enables rapid editing and creation of videos on OneDrive and SharePoint including features like trim, join, transitions, filters, text overlay, audio controls, screen/camera recording and more. Available via the web or Windows app for Microsoft 365 A3 and Microsoft 365 A5 SKUs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Official Communities Discovery
CurrentVersion.description: Official Communities are discoverable in the Communities Discovery page. Under Recommended Communities, there is an Official Communities section which highlights the communities that have been verified by the network admins.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Official Communities Discovery
OldVersion.description: Official Communities are discoverable in the Communities Discovery page. Under Recommended Communities, there is an Official Communities section which highlights the communities that have been verified by the network admins.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Import navigational links from SharePoint into Resources in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: On the desktop experience for Viva Connections, operators will be able to effortlessly import SharePoint links from their home site navigation and global navigation directly into the Resources section.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Import navigational links from SharePoint into Resources in Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: On the desktop experience for Viva Connections, operators will be able to effortlessly import SharePoint links from their home site navigation and global navigation directly into the Resources section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Export Q&A Questions
CurrentVersion.description: Event organizers can now export questions that attendees asked as a .CSV file, in order to better understand the questions asked and general sentiment in a meeting or event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Export Q&A Questions
OldVersion.description: Event organizers can now export questions that attendees asked as a .CSV file, in order to better understand the questions asked and general sentiment in a meeting or event.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New profile view with Org Chart and files
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a new and expanded profile view that includes an Org Chart and files. This item is being cancelled because it's a duplicate of ID 397093.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New profile view with Org Chart and files
OldVersion.description: This creates a new and expanded profile view that includes an Org Chart and files.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Planner: eDiscovery Support for Microsoft Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Conduct a content search for eDiscovery and legal hold on Planner tasks in Microsoft Purview. The Planner data available for eDiscovery includes tasks shared with groups, along with the comments and attachments associated with those tasks.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Planner: eDiscovery Support for Microsoft Planner
OldVersion.description: Conduct a content search for eDiscovery and legal hold on Planner tasks in Microsoft Purview. The Planner data available for eDiscovery includes tasks shared with groups, along with the comments and attachments associated with those tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Revoke and Delete Cloud PKI Certification Authorities
CurrentVersion.description: You can now revoke and delete Cloud PKI certification authorities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Choose custom images as icons for resources in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Operators will be able to add custom images as icons to links located in resources in Viva Connections!

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Choose custom images as icons for resources in Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: Operators will be able to add custom images as icons to links located in resources in Viva Connections!

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Conditional Access What If API
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Entra Conditional Access What If API can be used to programmatically test the impact of conditional access policies on user and workload identity sign-ins.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar grid keyboard navigation via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in day, week, and work week views. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Replace quick compose pop-up with inline appointment creation in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: When single clicking on an empty time slot on the calendar surface, the quick compose pop-up will no longer be shown - instead, you will be able to create an appointment by typing directly in the time slot on the calendar grid, just as you can in classic Outlook for Windows. There will be no change to double click behavior, the full compose form will still open as it does today. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use Copilot to select and rewrite specific pieces of text in an email in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,In classic Outlook for Windows, when composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience available in new Outlook for Windows, web, and classic Outlook soon will be available in Microsoft Outlook for iOS and Android through the module switcher.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Microsoft Copilot available in Outlook mobile
OldVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience available in new Outlook for Windows, web, and classic Outlook soon will be available in Microsoft Outlook for iOS and Android through the module switcher.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva for AI Transformation pre-built campaign in Viva Amplify
CurrentVersion.description: Pre-drafted publications, campaign objectives and key messages designed to communicate how to leverage Microsoft Viva for AI transformation.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Adding Inbound Support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft is committed to providing world-class email security solutions and the support for the latest Internet standards in order to provide advanced email protection for our customers. With this change we are adding inbound support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online. Look for another roadmap item which covers outbound mail. Note: This release (Preview) has been pushed to May to allow us to enhance our service’s security measures. We apologize for any inconveniences.

OldVersion.title: Exchange: Adding Inbound Support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft is committed to providing world-class email security solutions and the support for the latest Internet standards in order to provide advanced email protection for our customers. With this change we are adding inbound support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online. Look for another roadmap item which covers outbound mail. Note: This release (Preview) has been pushed to May to allow us to enhance our service’s security measures. We apologize for any inconveniences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
OldVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.

CurrentVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Easily manage Do Not Disturb presence status when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing a setting that allows Teams Phone Mobile users to opt-out of your presence automatically transitioning to Do Not Disturb when presenting or screen sharing. When this setting is enabled, users will be able to continue to receive call notifications when presenting, without having to manually adjust their presence status.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Exfiltration of business-sensitive data to free public domain emails
CurrentVersion.description:
,In this update, we are enhancing the existing email insight alerts to provide additional information when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. The new domain detection group "Free public domains" will list the common domains used for personal email accounts. Admins with appropriate permissions can choose to select these domains in their indicator variants.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections now available on web
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Connections is now available directly on the browser. All the same functionalities that exist in Teams now also surface directly in the browser, providing a consistent experience with other Viva Modules.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Auto-labeling policies support Fingerprinting SITs
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can now automatically label files and emails with Fingerprinting SITs via auto-labeling policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Clipchamp for Education (A3 & A5)
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp enables rapid editing and creation of videos on OneDrive and SharePoint including features like trim, join, transitions, filters, text overlay, audio controls, screen/camera recording and more. Available via the web or Windows app for Microsoft 365 A3 and Microsoft 365 A5 SKUs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Official Communities Discovery
CurrentVersion.description: Official Communities are discoverable in the Communities Discovery page. Under Recommended Communities, there is an Official Communities section which highlights the communities that have been verified by the network admins.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Import navigational links from SharePoint into Resources in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: On the desktop experience for Viva Connections, operators will be able to effortlessly import SharePoint links from their home site navigation and global navigation directly into the Resources section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Export Q&A Questions
CurrentVersion.description: Event organizers can now export questions that attendees asked as a .CSV file, in order to better understand the questions asked and general sentiment in a meeting or event.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New profile view with Org Chart and files
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a new and expanded profile view that includes an Org Chart and files. This item is being cancelled because it's a duplicate of ID 397093.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Planner: eDiscovery Support for Microsoft Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Conduct a content search for eDiscovery and legal hold on Planner tasks in Microsoft Purview. The Planner data available for eDiscovery includes tasks shared with groups, along with the comments and attachments associated with those tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Revoke and Delete Cloud PKI Certification Authorities
CurrentVersion.description: You can now revoke and delete Cloud PKI certification authorities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Choose custom images as icons for resources in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Operators will be able to add custom images as icons to links located in resources in Viva Connections!

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Entra: Conditional Access What If API
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Entra Conditional Access What If API can be used to programmatically test the impact of conditional access policies on user and workload identity sign-ins.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar grid keyboard navigation via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in day, week, and work week views. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Replace quick compose pop-up with inline appointment creation in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: When single clicking on an empty time slot on the calendar surface, the quick compose pop-up will no longer be shown - instead, you will be able to create an appointment by typing directly in the time slot on the calendar grid, just as you can in classic Outlook for Windows. There will be no change to double click behavior, the full compose form will still open as it does today. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use Copilot to select and rewrite specific pieces of text in an email in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,In classic Outlook for Windows, when composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience available in new Outlook for Windows, web, and classic Outlook soon will be available in Microsoft Outlook for iOS and Android through the module switcher.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva for AI Transformation pre-built campaign in Viva Amplify
CurrentVersion.description: Pre-drafted publications, campaign objectives and key messages designed to communicate how to leverage Microsoft Viva for AI transformation.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: Adding Inbound Support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft is committed to providing world-class email security solutions and the support for the latest Internet standards in order to provide advanced email protection for our customers. With this change we are adding inbound support for DNSSEC/DANE for SMTP to Exchange Online. Look for another roadmap item which covers outbound mail. Note: This release (Preview) has been pushed to May to allow us to enhance our service’s security measures. We apologize for any inconveniences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights manager, leader, and advanced insights available for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights is pleased to announce that manager, leader, and advanced insights will be available for GCC June 30, 2023. These premium insights help organizations understand and predict the impact of day-to-day actions to continuously improve the outcomes they care about.
